com.siperian.sif.message

Class SiperianResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptUnmatchedRecordsAsUniqueResponse, AddRelationshipResponse, ApplyChangeListResponse, AssignUnmergedRecordsResponse, AuditResponse, AuthenticateResponse, CanUnmergeRecordsResponse, CleanseResponse, CleanTableResponse, ClearAssignedUnmergedRecordsResponse, CreateChangeListResponse, CreateTaskResponse, DeleteRelationshipResponse, DeleteResponse, DescribeSiperianObjectResponse, ExecuteBatchGroupResponse, ExecuteBatchResponse, FlagForAutomergeResponse, GetAggregatePeriodResponse, GetAssignableUsersForTasksResponse, GetBatchGroupStatusResponse, GetBvtResponse, GetEffectivePeriodsResponse, GetEntityGraphResponse, GetLookupValueResponse, GetLookupValuesResponse, GetMergeHistoryResponse, GetOneHopResponse, GetOrsListResponse, GetOrsMetadataResponse, GetResourcePrivilegesResponse, GetResponse, GetSearchResultsResponse, GetSiperianObjectCompatibilityResponse, GetSystemTrustSettingsResponse, GetTaskLineageResponse, GetTasksResponse, GetTrustGraphDataResponse, GetTrustScoreResponse, GetUnmergedRecordCountResponse, GetValidationStatusResponse, GetXrefForEffectiveDateResponse, Link2Response, LinkResponse, ListSiperianObjectsResponse, MergeResponse, MultiMergeResponse, PreviewBvtResponse, ProcessRulesResponse, PromotePendingXrefsResponse, PutResponse, ReassignRecordsResponse, RegisterUsersResponse, RemoveMatchedRecordsResponse, ResetBatchGroupResponse, RestoreResponse, SearchResponseBase, SetPasswordResponse, SetRecordStateResponse, SyncCustomResourcesResponse, TokenizeResponse, Unlink2Response, UnlinkResponse, UnmergeResponse, UnregisterUsersResponse, UpdateMatchRecordResponse, UpdateRelationshipResponse, UpdateTaskResponse, ValidateChangeListResponse, ValidateMetadataResponse, ValidateTasksResponse

    public class SiperianResponse
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Base class for all Siperian Hub responses.

    The class provides access to attributes of all responses:

    • Status of the corresponding request.
    • Interaction identifier for grouping requests into interactions. Activity Manager treats requests with the same interaction ID as part of the same interaction.

    See Also:
    SiperianRequest, Serialized Form
